### Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (I have run `vendor/bin/pint`).
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.

- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings (checked with Larastan).

- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes.
